RealTests.com 100% Pass Guarantee

RealTests guarantees that you will pass your next exam using our verified study materials and practice exams. If for any reason you do not pass your exam, RealTests.com will provide you with another exam of your choice absolutely free within 90 days from the date of purchase, or a full refund within 30 days from the date of purchase.

Under What Conditions I can Claim the Guarantee?

Full Refund is valid for any RealTests Testing Engine Purchase where user fails the corresponding exam within 30 days from the date of purchase of Exam. Product Exchange is valid for customers who claim guarantee within 90 days from date of purchase. Customer can contact RealTests to claim this guarantee and get full refund at billing@realtests.com. Exam failures that occur before the purchasing date are not qualified for claiming guarantee. The refund request should be submitted within 7 days after exam failure.

The money-back-guarantee is not applicable on following cases:

  • Failure within 7 days after the purchase date. RealTests highly recommends the candidates a study time of minimum of 7 days to prepare for the exam with RealTests study material, any failures cases within 7 days of purchase are rejected because in-sufficient study of RealTests materials.
  • Wrong purchase. RealTests.com will not entertain any claims once the incorrect product is Downloaded and Installed.
  • Free exam. (No matter failed or wrong choice)
  • Expired order(s). (Out of 90 days from the purchase date)
  • Retired exam. (For customers who use our current product to attend the exam which is already retired.)
  • Audio Exams, Hard Copies and Labs Preparations are not covered by Guarantee and no claim can be made against them.
  • Products that are given for free.
  • Different names. (Candidate's name is different from payer's name.)
  • The refund option is not valid for Power Packs and guarantee can thus not be claimed on Power Pack purchases.
  • Guarantee Policy is not applicable to Avaya, CISSP, EMC, Oracle, PMI, Riverbed, SAP and SSCP exams as www.realtests.com provides only the practice questions for these.
  • Outdated Exam Products.

Digit Card Verification Number

  • Once you've selected a product, select from the available purchase options, such as: Questions And Answer product, Lab Preparations, Study guide and Audio Exam or physical shipment of Printed Version. Follow the prompts to complete your order. Note: Your steps may vary from these listed here, depending on the page(s) where you started.

    • Select the product(s) you would like to order and select from the available options such as: Value Packs, Power Packs, Hard Copies and click the Add to Cart button.
    • Your shopping cart will display a list of the product(s) you have ordered. To add more items to your cart Continue Shopping. Once you are finished selecting Products click the Cart button on Top Navigation Bar.
    • Fill in the Billing Information using the correct Information and click on Pay Now Button to proceed to payment. Before clicking the Pay Now button make sure that all information is Correct. A receipt page displays once you have successfully placed an order. You will then be asked to create login with realtests.com. If you currently have a Realtests account, you may log in through the Log In Now tab and then proceed to Checkout.
    • Enter your Account Information for the fields (* indicates required fields), and then click the Continue button.
    • Click the Install from My Account link or the Go to My Account Now button to install your products.

  • Reviewing Your Selections

    Your shopping cart lists the product(s) you have selected, along with quantities and totals. No Taxes are applied to Realtests Products. You may remove any products from your shopping cart by clicking the "Trash" button in the row of the item you would like to remove. Click the Continue Shopping button to add more items to your shopping cart or the Check Out button once you are done shopping and would like to proceed to checkout.

    Note: After clicking the Continue Shopping button, you can add any other retail product to your cart, you will be redirected to the Realtests All Products Online Store.

  • We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express and, in some countries, JCB. We also accept PayPal, Moneybookers, Bank Wire Transfer and Western Union.

  • When entering your credit card number on the Billing Information page, do not include spaces or dashes. Once you have completed the required information, click the Pay Now Button to proceed. Please do not click the "Pay Now" button more than once.

  • After checking out, you will be asked to create an account with Realtests, if you don't already have one. An account is required for accessing the Products.

    Complete the customer profile form and review the privacy policy. Click the Submit Button and your account will be created.

    Remember, the email address used to create your account on Realtests is your account ID. Use this email address to log in whenever you return to the Realtests Web site.

    If you currently have a Realtests Account, you may log in through the Log In Now link.

  • Whenever you purchase a Product, our system begin the 90 day validation period. After Expiry the Products will still show in your login and you can renew them at 40% discount just by click on the "Renew Now" button next to each Expired Product. Your shopping cart will show Product Renewal at 40% Discount. You may now proceed to check out.

  • After Purchase is complete, you will need to download and install your products from Realtests My Account by clicking on the relevant Download/Install/Update button(s).

  • You can use the Contact Us Page to find the relevant E-mail ID for specific Department.

  • Purchased Realtests Product can be download twice at any two locations of your choice. Two Authorization codes can be generated for each product from your Realtests Account. For Reinstalled any previously installed product you may need to reset code. Please contact Support - support@realtests.com for further assistance.

  • If your request is within the first 30 days of purchase, we'll gladly provide you a full refund. We do not provide partial refunds. Refund can only be claimed in case you have failed corresponding after using Realtests Question And Answer Product.

    IF YOU CLAIM FOR REFUND/EXCHANGE EXAM YOU MUST DELETE THE SOFTWARE IF ALREADY INSTALLED.

    You may exercise this right of Product Guarantee by contacting Customer Support at support@realtests.com

  • To purchase discounted product please Add the Product to cart and use provided Promo code and click Update Button. Contact Support Team for any assistance - e-mail billing@realtests.com if problem persists.

Simulator Tour

  • Features:

    1. View your test settings like test time, passing score. Note: test time & passing score can be changed. Currently these are set to actual test conditions.
    2. View all exams available.
    3. View your exam history - view all test results from your previous practice tests, once you have taken any. If you have any unfinished exams, you can resume them from here, or you can also delete unwanted exams.
    4. Practice exam mode - when this mode is used, you can see correct answers and explanations for each question.
    5. Virtual exam mode - in this mode you will get results only at the end of your exam. This is a simulation of an actual test environment.

  • Features:

    1. Timer/count down - indicates how much time you have left. It starts automatically once you launch your exam.
    2. Number of questions - indicates the number of questions in this test. Each question has several options. Just tick a box with the correct answer.
    3. Previous/next button navigation - if you aren't sure about some questions you can return back using 'previous' and 'next' buttons.
    4. End exam - you can end your exam anytime and then resume it from your main dashboard area.

  • Features:

    1. Correct answers with explanations - if you are not sure about a correct answer, just click on the answers and explanation link which will reveal a correct answer including an explanation.

  • Features:

    1. Mark for review - if for whatever reason you would like to review any question, simply mark it for review then review it by clicking on 'review marked' button.
    2. Make/read notes. This feature allows you to create your own notes and then read them later.

  • Features:

    1. Review market - this feature will display all questions available in your test plus any questions you marked for future review.

  • Features:

    1. The time elapsed.
    2. How many questions your answered correctly or incorrectly.
    3. Your passing score.

  • Features:

    1. Test time - this can be changed according to your needs, however 90 minutes is the standard time.
    2. Passing score - in order to pass your test, your passing score must be at least 85% or above.
    3. Questions in test - if you prefer to practice less questions at once then this option allows you to do so.
    4. Always show - if you always show, answers and explanations to all questions you will be always visible.

  • Features:

    1. Practise questions in random order.
    2. You can also select answers to questions in random order.
    3. Here you can set if answers and exlanations should be displayed automatically, or only when selected.

  • Features:

    1. Select this option in order to see all questions from all exam topics.
    2. This option allows you to see questions by type.
    3. If you want to see questions only from certain topics use this option.

  • Features:

    1. You can change appearance of questions and answers like font, font size, style and colours to the way you want it to be displayed.
    2. You can set different prompt messages: on closing of program, when removing items from exam history list and on finishing test in progress.

  • Features:

    1. If you are behind secure networks, you can set host and port in case of using proxy servers. You can also set username and password, if your network requires authentication.

Digit Card Verification Number

The card verification number is a security feature used for credit card transactions made over the phone or Internet. This three or four digit code provides the card holder with an extra level of security. Card verification codes can be found:

If you are using a Visa, Mastercard, or Discover card, it is a 3 digit number that appears to the right of your card number:

If you are using a Visa, Mastercard, or Discover card, it is a 3 digit number that appears to the right of your card number:
